name: Nautical Nonsense BETA
description:
Get ready for some Nautical Nonsense!

Get ready to reach the high score of this game by dodging grumpy sharks and eels. Avoiding puffer fish and sea mines, and the dreaded enemy of a sea side paddle.... the sea urchin. 

Pilot your submarine through a underwater cave full of obstacles and collect as many shiny clams as possible. Then see if your friends can beat your high score.

Can you be the new underwater clam collecting king?

Tap space bar to navigate through dangerous Underwater caverns! Tapping space bar will cause the submarine to move upwards, letting go of space bar will cause the submarine to sink.

Press customize on the menu to choose your own submarine!

To play our game download the .zip file.

Unpack the Zip file and run the game using the executable file named "nautical nonsense"
